name: Feed Meh
description:
Doctor C. Mo has solved a huge problem in the world. He’s been able to make fruits and vegetables grown to astounding sizes. Pears the size of a human head, carrots that stretch as far as the eye can see, and well… one of his experiments got a little out of control. It now needs to be fed anything “edible”. Be careful… once it develops a taste for meat, it may be a hard habit to break.

Press arrow keys (Or WASD) to move
Press spacebar to pickup items
Press ALT to attack people (To get meat to the plant)

Pickup and put food on the plants leaves to feed it. The more you feed it, the hungrier it gets (If you fill up the bar). Feeding it meat fills up the bar faster thereby increasing your score more.

This game was definitely inspired by Little Shop of Horrors.
